data.eml:eml: Descriptions of mature larvae and pupae of the genus Larinus (Coleoptera: Curculionidae, Lixinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gosik, Rafał, Skuhrovec, Jiří (2011): Descriptions of mature larvae and pupae of the genus Larinus (Coleoptera: Curculionidae, Lixinae). Zootaxa 3019: 1-25, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278666
